venue.name: Myles Standish State Forest fire tower

item.description:
We’ll meet at the Fire Tower Parking Lot #6 off Bare Hill Road (where it intersects the dirt Three Cornered Pond Road) to join the DCR Park Interpreter on a hike through Myles Standish State Forest.  This hike travels along different trails each week and is about 3 to 4 miles in length.  Please wear bug spray, sunscreen, and supportive shoes.  Bring along water and a snack.

 

Rain cancels  If in doubt, call Park Phone Number: 508-866-2526

All programs are free and open to the public unless otherwise noted. All children must be accompanied by an adult. Reasonable accommodations are available upon request.

Join us for breakfast at Metro's Cafe on 3A in Manomet at 7:30 if you are interested. All are welcome and the $2.95 Early Bird Special is a deal.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: DCR's Off The Beaten Path Hike: Fire Tower
